attributes.comment:
Please do not raise the rates any higher than they already are. Those of us who
are adopting already pay a high cost due the adoption itself. Also many of us
need to have some items redone due the criteria of 15 month legitimacy imposed
by law with our fingerprints and paperwork. Some adoptions are now taking up to
2 years requiring USCIS 171-H to be completed twice within the process.

If rates cannot be kept at the lower levels, please implement rule exceptions for
those of us who are adopting or raise the legitimacy time period from 15 months
to at least 24 months.

Thank you for your consideration in this matter.

Thank you,
John Kemp
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by John Kemp
